alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Northern Livingston; St. Helena; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 4:38PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of West Feliciana, northern West Baton Rouge, western St. Helena, north central Livingston, East Feliciana and northern East Baton Rouge Parishes through 530 PM CDT... At 437 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jackson, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Zachary, Baker, Jackson, St. Francisville, Clinton, Slaughter, Wilson, Norwood, Wakefield, Spillman, Darlington, Pride and Felps. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Northern Livingston; St. Helena; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana
